data.title: Lawn Service, Landscaping & Hardscaping
data.meta_description: Since 1997, Three Seasons Outdoor Living and Landscapes has been delivering lawn maintenance, landscape design and hardscape services to Manatee County.
data.text:
We Won Gold in Bradenton’s Best!

A HUGE thank you to everyone who voted for us!

We’re thrilled to announce that we’ve been awarded Gold in Bradenton’s Best as the Best Landscaping Company!

Your support means the world to us. We couldn’t have achieved this without our amazing community and dedicated team.

We’re excited to continue transforming your outdoor spaces into beautiful, lush landscapes.

Here’s to many more seasons of growth and excellence together!

Florida’s unique climate offers the perfect opportunity to create a lush, vibrant landscape that stands out year-round. Ornamental plants, with their diverse colors, textures, and shapes, are the key to transforming your garden into a stunning oasis. But knowing how to use these plants effectively in your landscape can be a challenge. Here’s a guide…

Summer in Palmetto, Florida, can be brutal on your garden. With soaring temperatures and intense sun, your plants can quickly become stressed, wilted, or even burned if not properly cared for. But with the right strategies, you can keep your garden thriving through the hottest months. Here’s how to protect your plants from the summer…

Did your plants get too much water this weekend? Living in the Palmetto area, we’re no strangers to heavy rain, especially during the wet season. While rain is generally beneficial for plants, too much of it can cause problems like waterlogged soil, root rot, and nutrient deficiencies. Here’s how you can help care for your…

About Three Seasons in Palmetto, FL

Established in 1997, Three Seasons Outdoor Living and Landscapes was started by Rich Alexander as a one-man business and has been dedicated to delivering top quality landscaping and hardscaping services. Rich attended the Walt Disney Institute for landscaping and understands how to use landscaping to not only enhance your outdoor space, but also provide functionality, seasonal beauty and low maintenance. Even though we’ve grown into a much larger team, Rich still works one-on-one with property owners to bring their landscaping and hardscaping visions to life.

Read more about Three Seasons.
